00059   int  g_delay = 0;
00060   bool g_verbose = false;
00061   const int DEFAULT_PORT = 11255;
00062   const char *usage[] = {
00063     "usage: sampleServer [OPTIONS]",
00064     "",
00065     "OPTIONS:",
00066     "  --connect-to=<addr>  Connect to a client listening on <addr> (TCP only)."
00067     "  --help          Display this help text and exit",
00068     "  --port=<n>      Specifies the port to listen on (default=11255)",
00069     "  --app-queue     Use an application queue for handling requests",
00070     "  --reactors=<n>  Specifies the number of reactors (default=1)",
00071     "  --delay=<ms>    Milliseconds to wait before echoing message (default=0)",
00072     "  --udp           Operate in UDP mode instead of TCP",
00073     "  --verbose,-v    Generate verbose output",
00074     ""
00075     "This is a sample program to test the AsyncComm library.  It establishes",
00076     "a connection with the sampleServer and sends each line of the input file",
00077     "to the server.  Each reply from the server is echoed to stdout.",
00078     (const char *)0
00079   };

00086   class RequestHandler : public ApplicationHandler {
00087   public:
00088 
00089     RequestHandler(Comm *comm, EventPtr &event_ptr)
00090       : ApplicationHandler(event_ptr), m_comm(comm) { return; }
00091 
00092     virtual void run() {
00093       CommHeader header;
00094       header.initialize_from_request_header(m_event_ptr->header);
00095       CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(header, m_event_ptr->payload_len));
00096       cbp->append_bytes((uint8_t *)m_event_ptr->payload,
00097                         m_event_ptr->payload_len);
00098       int error = m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbp);
00099       if (error != Error::OK) {
00100         HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_response returned %s", Error::get_text(error));
00101       }
00102     }
00103   private:
00104     Comm *m_comm;
00105   };
00106

00112   class Dispatcher : public DispatchHandler {
00113 
00114   public:
00115 
00116     Dispatcher(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueue *app_queue)
00117       : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue(app_queue) { return; }
00118 
00119     virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00120       if (g_verbose && event_ptr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00121         HT_INFO("Connection Established.");
00122       }
00123       else if (g_verbose && event_ptr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00124         if (event_ptr->error != 0) {
00125           HT_INFOF("Disconnect : %s", Error::get_text(event_ptr->error));
00126         }
00127         else {
00128           HT_INFO("Disconnect.");
00129         }
00130       }
00131       else if (event_ptr->type == Event::ERROR) {
00132         HT_WARNF("Error : %s", Error::get_text(event_ptr->error));
00133       }
00134       else if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00135         if (m_app_queue == 0) {
00136           CommHeader header;
00137           header.initialize_from_request_header(event_ptr->header);
00138           CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(header, event_ptr->payload_len));
00139           cbp->append_bytes((uint8_t *)event_ptr->payload,
00140                             event_ptr->payload_len);
00141           if (g_delay > 0)
00142             poll(0, 0, g_delay);
00143           int error = m_comm->send_response(event_ptr->addr, cbp);
00144           if (error != Error::OK) {
00145             HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_response returned %s",
00146                       Error::get_text(error));
00147           }
00148         }
00149         else
00150           m_app_queue->add(new RequestHandler(m_comm, event_ptr));
00151       }
00152     }
00153 
00154   private:
00155     Comm             *m_comm;
00156     ApplicationQueue *m_app_queue;
00157   };
00158

00165   class UdpDispatcher : public DispatchHandler {
00166   public:
00167 
00168     UdpDispatcher(Comm *comm) : m_comm(comm) { return; }
00169 
00170     virtual void handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00171       if (event_ptr->type == Event::MESSAGE) {
00172         CommHeader header;
00173         header.initialize_from_request_header(event_ptr->header);
00174         CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(header, event_ptr->payload_len));
00175         cbp->append_bytes((uint8_t *)event_ptr->payload,
00176                           event_ptr->payload_len);
00177         if (g_delay > 0)
00178           poll(0, 0, g_delay);
00179         int error = m_comm->send_datagram(event_ptr->addr,
00180                                           event_ptr->local_addr, cbp);
00181         if (error != Error::OK) {
00182           HT_ERRORF("Comm::send_response returned %s", Error::get_text(error));
00183         }
00184       }
00185       else {
00186         HT_ERRORF("Error : %s", event_ptr->to_str().c_str());
00187       }
00188     }
00189 
00190   private:
00191     Comm           *m_comm;
00192   };

00199   class HandlerFactory : public ConnectionHandlerFactory {
00200   public:
00201     HandlerFactory(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp)
00202       : m_dispatch_handler_ptr(dhp) { return; }
00203 
00204     virtual void get_instance(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00205       dhp = m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00206     }
00207 
00208   private:
00209     DispatchHandlerPtr m_dispatch_handler_ptr;
00210   };
00211 
00212 }

00218 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00219   Comm *comm;
00220   int rval, error;
00221   uint16_t port = DEFAULT_PORT;
00222   int reactor_count = 2;
00223   ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chfp;
00224   ApplicationQueue *app_queue = 0;
00225   bool udp = false;
00226   DispatchHandlerPtr dhp;
00227   struct sockaddr_in local_addr;
00228   struct sockaddr_in client_addr;
00229 
00230   Config::init(0, 0);
00231 
00232   memset(&client_addr, 0, sizeof(client_addr));
00233 
00234   for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00235     if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--help"))
00236       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00237     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--app-queue")) {
00238       app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(5);
00239     }
00240     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--connect-to=", 13)) {
00241       if (!InetAddr::initialize(&client_addr, &argv[i][13]))
00242         HT_ABORT;
00243     }
00244     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--port=", 7)) {
00245       rval = atoi(&argv[i][7]);
00246       if (rval <= 1024 || rval > 65535) {
00247         cerr << "Invalid port.  Must be in the range of 1024-65535." << endl;
00248         exit(1);
00249       }
00250       port = (uint16_t)rval;
00251     }
00252     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--reactors=", 11))
00253       reactor_count = atoi(&argv[i][11]);
00254     else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--delay=", 8))
00255       g_delay = atoi(&argv[i][8]);
00256     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--udp"))
00257       udp = true;
00258     else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00259       g_verbose = true;
00260     else
00261       Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00262   }
00263 
00264   ReactorFactory::initialize(reactor_count);
00265 
00266   comm = Comm::instance();
00267 
00268   if (g_verbose) {
00269     cout << "Listening on port " << port << endl;
00270     if (g_delay)
00271       cout << "Delay = " << g_delay << endl;
00272   }
00273 
00274   InetAddr::initialize(&local_addr, "localhost", port);
00275 
00276   if (!udp) {
00277     dhp = new Dispatcher(comm, app_queue);
00278 
00279     if (client_addr.sin_port != 0) {
00280       if ((error = comm->connect(client_addr, local_addr, dhp)) != Error::OK) {
00281         HT_ERRORF("Comm::connect error - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00282         exit(1);
00283       }
00284     }
00285     else {
00286       chfp = new HandlerFactory(dhp);
00287       comm->listen(local_addr, chfp, dhp);
00288     }
00289   }
00290   else {
00291     assert(client_addr.sin_port == 0);
00292     dhp = new UdpDispatcher(comm);
00293     comm->create_datagram_receive_socket(&local_addr, 0, dhp);
00294   }
00295 
00296   poll(0, 0, -1);
00297 
00298   return 0;
00299 }
